ing: 10 ounces cooked, boneless chicken breast halves, diced
des: "For this recipe I like to use a ready-to-top prepared pizza crust because of the extra seasonings and cheese already baked onto it."
ins:
Place the pizza shell on a pizza pan or platter and top with the greens.
Place the chicken over the greens and drizzle with dressing. Slice and serve.
